extendedInfo.description: Bluzz Trivial Minds is a quiz game with frequent upgrades that allows to play on multiplayer with friends or check your knowledge in a single game. You can choose from 3 difficulties (easy, normal, hard) to adapt questions to player level.English, german and spanish languages supported. More trivia questions will be added for both languages in future updates.You can set your nickname and avatar to compete in a global ranking, where you can compare your scores with all players in the different game modes.** One player ** - Arcade: get the best score you can in 12 questions. - Time Attack: survive all you can while you have time. Correct answers will increase your life time. - 60 seconds: you have one minute to answer the most amount of questions. Need to be fast!- 60 seconds: standar game with one answer hidden, can you handle it?** Multiplayer ** - Local: in the same device you can create a turn-based game for 2-8 friends. - Bluetooth and local area network: play with your friends and beat them throuht bluetooth or local area network (LAN). There are two modes to make the experience greater. - Online: connect to our server automatically to play versus all 'bluzzers' in a game. While you wait until game starts, you can practice with some questions.** Tournaments ** - Ladder ELO: challenge your friends and players and reach the top! To the glory!This quiz is under upgrades all the time with new questions, new mode games, improvements and fixes. It's very importante to have lastest verson installed for the smooth running of the game.If you liked Bluzz Trivia, dont forget to rate and share it with your fiends and of course, put a comment, it only takes 1 minute and we promise to read them all! If you have any problem or suggestion, contact us throught email or our facebook page at: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Bluzz-Trivial-Minds/349055375137079The show must go on!keywords: quiz, trivia, trivial, trivial pursuit, preguntas, respuestas, questions, answers, conocimientos, buzz, concurso, 50x15, espaÃ±ol, spanish, ingles, english, show, online, multiplayer, multijugador, millonario, millon, millionaire, knowledge, juego, game, iq, test, coeficiente, cociente, intelectual, ci, logo quiz, pvp trivia, mobile, free, trivia, trivia, trivia, trivia, trivia, trivia, trivia, quiz, quiz, quiz, quiz, quiz, quiz, quiz, quiz, quiz, quiz, quiz, multiplayer quiz, online quiz, multiplayer trivia, online trivia, quiz challenge, trivia challenge, trivia ladder elo, quiz ladder elo, tournament trivia, tournament quiz

reviews.title: Great Time Waster
reviews.comment: Fun game I can play with or without my friends/family.
reviews.author: Ash McCallum

reviews.comment: Overall this app is fun and informative. However, the \"have it your way\" slogan is Burger King\'s not Subway.
